text:
I am so sick of this song.

I mean, it's catchy and memorable, but I don't even think it's one of the best songs on this soundtrack, nevermind one of the best songs in gaming like people seem to make it out to be.

It this might just be growing resentment over the fact that this song is overused and overfeatured as hell when the entire soundtrack is just as worthy, if not more.  But I've really grown sick of this song.
